segments.text: I notice the open cabinet doors, revealing the cookie jar filled with cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching in, trying to get his hands on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been planning this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar looks full, and the cookies seem tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of excitement, hoping they succeed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is filled with a sense of adventure and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit nostalgic, remembering my own childhood adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they've picked the perfect time to execute their plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely absorbed in her task, unaware of their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy their cookies and get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
